(At the Poeple's Base) Dracona left the Artist hunt up to Plintissa and
returned to the Poeple's Base and upon request from gangon, crafted him a
new body. Gangon looked in the mirror.

"Who is this?" he asked. Dracona showed himit was a mirror. He realized he
looked different.

"Now nobody will reconize me." Gangon said. He transformed to beast mode, he
looked different there, too. He scurried outside of the base.

"Don't follow me, I don't want to have anything to do with you, thanks for
helping me, but maybe you should have left me to die, now I don't know what
I'll do. Dracona got this all the time back on Cybertron.

"Sure." She said. Gangon walked off. He seen BrightBlade suddenly! he walked
up to it, transforming to robot mode. She disappeared. Gangon looked at a
hologram machine. (I didn't control BrightBlade, it was a hologram.) Gangon
looked up and a vulture twice his size was staring him in the eyes. Gangon
turned to run but felt a deep pain and fell. A knife stuck into his back. He
had just gotten healed and now he got this! Inzola snickered.

"This one will be good for spark doning! His spark can go into your healing
machine!" Said the giant termite, Inzola.

"Yes! You have Lightmare's spark ready? It's time!" Deemos said. Gangon
screamed as Deemos ripped his spark out. Deemos stuck it into a jar.

"Transmetal 2 style healing will be ours!" Deemos said. Deemos and Inzola
placed the sparks into the machines they built, they were tiny devices.

"Now what?" Inzola asked.

"Swallow them, they travel through you and afix to your spark!" Deemos said.
They both swallowed the devices and they healing devices hooked onto their
sparks and gave them the ability.

"Don't worry about them, their sparks are helplessly floating, thay can't do
nothing!" Deemos said. Inzola nodded and they both leaned back and were
healed over 5 minutes, seeing as how their injuries were minute. They looked
back at the Alliance base.

"I guess they don't want us." Inzola said.

"We'll wait a bit longer." Deemos said.

"Hey, whomever is in charge, please come and judge us, we wish to join!"
Deemos called out...

> ::KitKat::
>
> She threw another rock into the air and shot at it.  She knew she had
> a good aim and hardly ever missed her mark.  She tossed another on
> into the air and shot again hitting the rock.
>
> "OK. Now your turn Quickstrike." She picked up a rock and threw it
> into the air, waiting to see him shoot.
> It wasn't much for entertainment.  But it did help pass the time.
